import{AppBar,Box,Tab,Tabs}from'@mui/material';import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CatNavbar(_ref){let{value,onChange}=_ref;const tabStyles=index=>({margin:'2.5px',backgroundColor:value===index?'#ffffff':'transparent',color:value===index?'#000000':'#ffffff',borderRadius:'10px',transition:'0.3s','&:hover':{backgroundColor:value===index?'#f0f0f0':'#555555'}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',mb:'25px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",sx:{backgroundColor:'#393636',p:'10px',width:'50%',alignSelf:'center',borderRadius:'20px',mt:'25px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Tabs,{value:value,onChange:onChange,variant:"fullWidth",centered:true,TabIndicatorProps:{style:{display:'none'}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{label:"Official Update",sx:tabStyles(0)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{label:"Following",sx:tabStyles(1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{label:"Community Post",sx:tabStyles(2)})]})})});}
